name: Blackwake
descr:
[b]Blackwake is a multiplayer naval FPS focused on teamwork and cooperation.[/b]

[img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/420290/extras/Untitled-1.jpg?t=1709060640[/img]
[list][li]Fire cannons, sink ships or board them with FPS combat
[/li][li]54 Players, small and large ships. Crews up to 13 players
[/li][li]Maintain your ship, make repairs, reload & resupply cannons
[/li][li]A large selection of weapons to snipe, slice and blow away nasty pirates
[/li][li]Captain a vessel through nomination, issue orders to yer' crew & fight tactically on the sea
[/li][li]3 Game modes of TDM, Siege (fort attack/defend) & Capture the Booty
[/li][li]Navigate maps with variation. Different weather, time of day, avoid volcano eruptions & Icebergs
[/li][li]Customize your Character and Ship by leveling your rank![/li][/list][img]https://shared.fastly.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/420290/extras/Untitled-2.jpg?t=1709060640[/img]
detail:
名称: Blackwake
类型: 动作, 休闲, 独立, 策略, 免费开玩
开发商: Mastfire Studios Pty Ltd
发行商: Mastfire Studios Pty Ltd
发行日期: 2020 年 2 月 19 日
review: 最近评测: 褒贬不一 (67) - 过去 30 天内的 67 篇用户评测中有 68% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (25,711) - 此游戏的 25,711 篇用户评测中有 80% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (25,711 篇中的 80%) 发布至今
最近评测: 褒贬不一 (67 篇中的 68%) 最近
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit
处理器: i5 2400, FX-6300
内存: 10 GB RAM
显卡: R9 270, GTX 660
DirectX 版本: 11
网络: 宽带互联网连接
存储空间: 需要 4 GB 可用空间
附注事项: This is to play the game on lowest settings with medium shadows at around 60FPS@1080p resolution.
推荐配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit
处理器: i5 6500, AMD FX-8350
内存: 12 GB RAM
显卡: R9 290, GTX 970
DirectX 版本: 11
网络: 宽带互联网连接
存储空间: 需要 4 GB 可用空间
附注事项: This is to play the game on High settings at 60FPS@1080p resolution. More CPU power is required on larger servers with more players. Newer i7 CPU's should handle the game easily.
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。

Mac OS X
最低配置:
操作系统: OS X 10.8
处理器: i5/i7 CPU
内存: 8 GB RAM
显卡: R9 270, GTX 660 equivalent
网络: 宽带互联网连接
存储空间: 需要 4 GB 可用空间
附注事项: The game does have Mac support but our Mac testers are quite small to give an accurate minimum specs.
推荐配置:
网络: 宽带互联网连接
*
2024 年 2 月 15 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将不再支持 32 位游戏及 macOS 10.14 或更低版本。
